import React from 'react' import "./booking.css" import { Form, FromGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from "reactstrap" const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price, reviews} = tour return

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating=== 0 ? 'Not Rated' : ({reviews?.length})}
} export default Booking
